Introducing Photon+ and the Photon+ Visionary Alliance: Taking Your Vision to Infinity and Beyond!

Are you tired of squinting through the robot‚Äôs eyes? Do you dream of a world where your FRC team‚Äôs vision processing software is as clear as a crystal ball? Well, dream no more, because Photon+ is here to make your wildest robotic dreams come true!

Say goodbye to blurry images and hello to premium features that will dazzle your circuits! With Photon+, you‚Äôll unlock a universe of benefits that will skyrocket your robot‚Äôs performance to new heights!

Enhanced Vision Processing: Experience vision processing like never before with our patented Photon Charge Correction technology which ensures that no negatively charged light enters your robot and throws off your RoboRio‚Äôs charge balance! Say hello to 20/24 vision for your robot! (offer only valid for cameras with adjustable focus; PCC requires user to perform rudimentary manual tasks)

Critical Bug Fixes: Bugs creeping into your code like unwanted house guests? Not anymore! With Photon+, we‚Äôll squash those pesky mission-critical bugs faster than you can say ‚Äúdebugging‚Äù! (non-critical bug fixes not guaranteed; offer not valid in the state of California)

Performance Improvements: Accelerate your team‚Äôs performance exponentially with an exclusive set of performance improvements, JUST for Photon+ subscribers! We hired an intern to remove all those pesky print statements and random sleep statements, and switched object detection back to using the GPU (which only crashes quietly occasionally). And because Photon+ is software perfected and can never fail, we‚Äôve removed all logging and debugging capabilities. And less code = more fast!

Photon+ Visionary Alliance! Want to earn while you learn? Become a Photon+ distributor and start earning cold, hard cash by recruiting other FRC teams into the Photon+ family! It‚Äôs like building your own robot empire, one team at a time!

Exclusive Software Support: Need a helping hand with your vision processing woes? Fear not! With Photon+, you‚Äôll have access to our team of expert engineers who will guide you through every pixel of your code. It‚Äôs like having a personal genie in a bottle, but better! And as a member of the Photon+ Visionary Alliance, you‚Äôll unlock exclusive benefits like pit-side support at Champs, access to our exclusive Photon+ Discord community, dedicated software support for YOUR hardware(1) and more! (support requires grossing transportation costs; outcomes not guaranteed)

But wait, there‚Äôs more! Sign up now and receive a free pair of virtual reality goggles for your robot‚Äôs camera! It‚Äôs like giving your robot its own set of eyes‚Ä¶ in another dimension!

So what are you waiting for? Upgrade to Photon+ today and let your robot see the world in glorious, premium high-definition! It‚Äôs time to shine bright like a photon!

(Payments accepted in PhotonCoin, E-Coin, and Canandcoder barters only. Photon+ is not a registered trademark in any country recognized by the United Nations. Offer only valid between 11:58pm and 11:59pm ET on April 1, 2020)

(1) Dedicated software support requires donation of control system and vision hardware to developers
Someone check what he had for breakfast‚Ä¶. I want one too!
